name: ZAR (zombie apocalypse in Russia)
description:
2023 year. After another outbreak of the coronavirus epidemic, the authorities decided to test a new vaccine and sprayed it over the outback of the Russian province. The vaccine helped and the epidemic was extinguished. Everyone who died during the epidemic began to rise from the ground and began to zombie
The area was fenced off by the military
To study the phenomenon in the quarantine zone, they began to send volunteers for a small fee
From across the country, the unemployed rushed into the quarantine zone in search of earnings
You are one of those volunteers. Your task is to survive as long as possible in the zone, study the strengths and weaknesses of the zombies, and also kill two special zombies, which for some unknown reason received special abilities
Gravedigger. Spawns in the village cemetery. Very strong. In close combat, he hits with a shovel. There are three more zombies in the far vault next to you
Fisherman. Spawns near the waterfall. In close combat, it hits with a hook and a fish. In the far, it drains a person, causing intense thirst
Also, people remained in the quarantine zone.
Hunter. He finally lost his mind and now kills everyone who approaches his hut in the forest. in close combat hits with a hunting knife. shoots from afar from its double-barreled sawn-off shotgun. Knife and sawed-off shotgun, if you're lucky, you can pick it up as a trophy by killing the hunter
There is also a food vendor in the village. Weapon dealer and doctor. They, just like you, came to the quarantine zone to earn money and they are paid, but they must give food, weapons and medicines to the rest of the players for free
